info.title: SuperOffice REST API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

get.description:
Can be sorted and further filtered using OData conventions:

* User?$select=col1,col2,abc/col3
* User?$filter=col1 eq 'foo' and startswith(col2, 'baz')
* User?$orderby=abc/col3,col1
* User?$top=1000
* User?$mode=full


OData returns XML or JSON carriers depending on the Accept headers.


Calls the Archive service using the "AllUsers" archive.


## Filter Operators: ##

ints: eq =, ne, le, lt, gt, ge, set, equals, greater, less, unequals, between

strings: contains, is, notBegins, notContains, isNot

associate: associateIsOneOf, associateIsNotOneOf,  

list ids: oneOf, NotOneOf, 

dates: before, date, after, dateBetween, beforeToday

Unary ops: currentAssociate, beforeToday, today, afterToday, lastWeek, thisWeek, nextWeek, lastMonth, thisMonth, nextMonth, lastQuarter, thisQuarter, nextQuarter, thisHalf, thisYear

Funcs: substringof(a,b), startswith(a,b), endswith(a,b), this(f,period), next(f,n,period), previous(f,n,period), thisAndNext(f,n,period), thisAndPrevious(f,n,period), thisAndPreviousAndNext(f,period)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Comma separated list of column names to return. "nameDepartment,fullname,category". Can also use aggregation functions and modifiers: "Count(category):Footer"

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Expression to restrict the results. e.g.: "name begins 'foo' and category gt 1"

parameters.name: $orderBy
parameters.description: Comma separated list of column names to sort by, with optional direction. "name asc,fullname,category desc"

parameters.name: $entities
parameters.description: Comma separated list of entity names to use. Default = "". "contact, person"

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of rows to return in results

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of rows from database to skip before returning results

parameters.name: $mode
parameters.description: FULL (with raw values and hints for each value) or SLIM (just the display values)

parameters.name: $options
parameters.description: Provider specific options. e.g: "GrandTotal=true"

parameters.name: $context
parameters.description: Provider specific context parameter.

parameters.name: $format
parameters.description: Set XML or JSON output format; override the format determined from Accept header.

parameters.name: $jsonSafe
parameters.description: Make output names into JSON safe property names. Replace all unsafe characters with _ underscore.

parameters.name: $output
parameters.description: Return Logical or Display values in SLIM mode. Logical returns true/false for booleans, Display returns icon hints. Dates are always returned as ISO strings.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.description:
Calls the User agent service SaveUser.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.
<para />## Online Restricted: ## The User agent is not available in Online by default. User management is not allowed for partner apps.

parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category" Default = show all fields.

SuperOffice.Services.WebApi.OData.ODataS.description: Easy to use archive results - just a flat list of values.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.UserCarri.description:
SuperOffice User, with login credentials and an associated person.
<para />
User entity with API _Links added.

Name.description: Initials, UserId - also used as login name for on-site installations. Identifies user in archives.

LicenseOwners.description: The restricted and unrestricted module licenses grouped by license owner. These module licenses are either assigned or unassigned to this user

Role.description: Users role for role-based security. Determines permissions and access rights for the user.

UserGroup.description:
The main user group that this user belongs to. 
<para>Use MDO List name "usergroup" to get list items.</para>

OtherGroups.description:
The other groups this user is a member of, apart from the main user group. 
<para>Use MDO List name "usergroup" to get list items.</para>

Person.description:
The person associated with this user. Detailed information about the user 
<para>Use MDO List name "person_new" to get list items.</para>

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

IsPersonRetired.description: True if the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

IsOnTravel.description: True if the user is on travel.

Credentials.description: List of credentials registered for this user. i.e. valid authentication methods.

UserName.description: User name, a.k.a. Login name. This might be an e-mail address.

TicketCategories.description:
Request Ticket Categories assigned to the user.  
<para>Use MDO List name "ejCategory" to get list items.</para>

NickName.description: The unique nick name for this user. Used in Service as an alias, similar to Name/Initials.

WaitingForApproval.description: The user is waiting for an administrator to approve/grant her/him access.

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

PostSaveCommands.description: Post custom commands the client should execute after save has completed.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LicenseOwner.description:
Carrier object for LicenseOwner.
Services for the LicenseOwner Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ILicenseAgent">License Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name of the license owner

UnrestrictedModuleLicenses.description: The unrestricted module licenses that this license owner

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ModuleLicenseLi.description:
License assignments carrier
<para />
Carrier object for ModuleLicenseLink.
Services for the ModuleLicenseLink Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ILicenseAgent">License Agent</see>.

Unrestricted.description: Is this module license restricted or unrestricted

Total.description: The total number of module licenses. In other words the number of free license added to the number of licenses in use equals the total number of licenses

Tooltip.description: The tooltip to be shown in some gui with details on the module license

CanAssign.description: Can a specific user assign this module license

Free.description: The number of licenses that are free to be assigned

InUse.description: The total number of licenses (of a given license module) that are occupied

Assigned.description: Is the module license assigned to a given user?

ModuleLicenseId.description: The identifier of the module license

Name.description: The name of the module license

Description.description: The description of the module license

PrerequisiteModuleName.description: Name of module that must be active for this license to be used.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Role.description:
Users role for role-based security
<para />
Carrier object for Role.
Services for the Role Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserGroup.description:
The main user group that this user belongs to
<para />
Carrier object for UserGroup.
Services for the UserGroup Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: Deleted equal to true means that this is a user group that no longer can be selected by the user.  It is not permitted to delete a UserGroup.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Person.description:
Carrier object for Person.
Services for the Person Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

Position.description: The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title

FullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

DirectPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the contact person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Retired.description: 1 = the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Rank.description: Display sort sequence for default sort order

ActiveInterests.description: Number of records in pintr table; select count(*) from pintr pi where pi.person_id = this.person_id == activeInterests is always true

FaxPhone.description: Returns the fax phone that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhone.description: Returns the mobile phone that belong to the contact person.

ContactPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the persons contact.

AssociateId.description: Id of the item's owner (Associate id)

UsePersonAddress.description: If 1, use person's address for mailing instead of company address

ContactFax.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

SupportAssociateId.description: Our support contact for this person

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Credential.description:
Credentials supported for authentication
<para />
Carrier object for Credential.
Services for the Credential Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Value.description: This is the actuall value of the credentials.  This will typically be the password or teh users SID in active directory

DisplayValue.description: The value displayed to the user. this will typically be the users login name in active directory.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CredentialType.description:
Description of credential type
<para />
Carrier object for CredentialType.
Services for the CredentialType Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

DisplayType.description: The name of the credentials to be displayed in the user interface.  This will typically be Password for user-name/password scenarios and Active Directoru User for AD integration.

Type.description: Type of credentials, corresponding to name of plugin and type in the credentials table

Description.description: Description of the authentication type.  This value is used in a list of authentication providers that can be choosen by an end user and should be a fairly describtive text.  This will typically be SuperOffice is responsible for username and password for a password scenario.

ValueControl.description: Type of control used to display the value.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.MDOListItem.description:
Carrier object for MDOListItem.
Services for the MDOListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IMDOAgent">MDO Agent</see>.

Deleted.description: The deleted status of the ListItem

Type.description: The type of the ListItem. Custom field.

ChildItems.description: The child items of the MDOListItem

IconHint.description: The Icon hint of the ListItem. Custom field.

ColorBlock.description: The color indicator of the ListItem color block

ExtraInfo.description: Extra information added to the ListItem. Could be information such as sort order etc or other meta data. Custom field.

StyleHint.description: Style hint indicating, information such as background color etc. Custom field.

FullName.description: The name of the ListItem in its context

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomCommand.description:
Generic carrier object for entity commands.
<para />
Carrier object for CustomCommand.

DisplayName.description: The name to show in GUI

ToolTip.description: Tooltip to be used in the GUI

Actions.description: The actions to call when invoked

ActionData.description: The data to be used when the command is invoked

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.description:
SuperOffice User, with login credentials and an associated person.
<para />
Carrier object for User.
Services for the User Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Name.description: Initials, UserId - also used as login name for on-site installations. Identifies user in archives.

LicenseOwners.description: The restricted and unrestricted module licenses grouped by license owner. These module licenses are either assigned or unassigned to this user

Role.description: Users role for role-based security. Determines permissions and access rights for the user.

UserGroup.description:
The main user group that this user belongs to. 
<para>Use MDO List name "usergroup" to get list items.</para>

OtherGroups.description:
The other groups this user is a member of, apart from the main user group. 
<para>Use MDO List name "usergroup" to get list items.</para>

Person.description:
The person associated with this user. Detailed information about the user 
<para>Use MDO List name "person_new" to get list items.</para>

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

IsPersonRetired.description: True if the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

IsOnTravel.description: True if the user is on travel.

Credentials.description: List of credentials registered for this user. i.e. valid authentication methods.

UserName.description: User name, a.k.a. Login name. This might be an e-mail address.

TicketCategories.description:
Request Ticket Categories assigned to the user.  
<para>Use MDO List name "ejCategory" to get list items.</para>

NickName.description: The unique nick name for this user. Used in Service as an alias, similar to Name/Initials.

WaitingForApproval.description: The user is waiting for an administrator to approve/grant her/him access.

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.User.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

PostSaveCommands.description: Post custom commands the client should execute after save has completed.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UserPresenceSta.description:
Manage present/absent status for a Service user account (influences ticket assignments).
<para />
Carrier object for UserPresenceStatus.
Services for the UserPresenceStatus Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserAgent">User Agent</see>.

Message.description: Comment to add for user when status is not present.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.FieldInfoBase.description:
Abstract basic information about database fields. May be custom or user-defined fields. The information can be used to build a user interface.
<para />
Carrier object for FieldInfoBase.
Services for the FieldInfoBase Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IUserDefinedFieldInfoAgent">UserDefinedFieldInfo Agent</see>.

FieldType.description: What sort of data does this field contain. 1 = int, 2 = short text, ...

DisplayName.description: Label for field. May be multi-lang string encoded.

Description.description: Optional tooltip text for this field

ShortLabel.description: Short name to be used in Archive headings and on page 1. If blank, the fieldLabel will be used everywhere.

HideField.description: Hide the field from the UI. Only allow API access.

IsIndexed.description: Is this field indexed? 0 if no, index no. if yes

IsMandatory.description: 0 = no, 1 = yes (field must be filled out)

IsExternal.description: Should this field be shown to external users via customer center?

IsDisplayField.description: Flag indicating that this field is chosen as DisplayField for a table it belongs

Rank.description: Tab order, ranking within the custom fields.

TemplateVariableName.description: Template variable name: 'cs01', 'cl02' etc. Null for extra fields.

Associate.description: Associate name (e.g. logon name) for the user

IsPerson.description: Is this associate a person, and not a resource?

HomeCountryId.description: Country id for the user's home country.  This is the default country id when creating new items.

BusinessId.description: BusinessIdx for the company that the user belongs to.

CategoryId.description: CategoryIdx of the company that the user belongs to.

ContactOwner.description: Owner (AssocaiteId) of the company that the user belongs to.

RoleDescription.description: Descrtiption (e.g. tooltip) for the users role

Licenses.description: License granted to the site and user.

FullName.description: The Person full name if the associate is a person. Use IsPerson to check

EMailAddress.description: The Person e-mail address if the associate is a person. Use IsPerson to check

FunctionRights.description: Functional rights for the user.  This array is sorted so a lookup can be performed using {M:System.Array.BinarySearch(System.Array,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Object)}.

EjUserId.description: Primary key in eJournal's old user table.

ProvidedCredentials.description: The credentials used for authenticating this user.

UserName.description: UserName on associatetable. Same as SuperId from Online

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.GrantedModuleLi.description: Represents a single module license granted to a user.

OwnerId.description: Primary key of the ModuleOwner row.

OwnerName.description:
Unique name identifying the module owner. 
Must match primer data installed by module. e.g. "SUPEROFFICE" or "ADWIZA"

OwnerDescription.description: Description of the owner module as shown in the user interface.

Name.description: Unique name identifying the module. e.g. "WINCAL" or "SUPERSERVER"

Description.description: Name of the module as shown in the user interface.

Version.description: Version of the module license (for future use).

LicenseType.description: Type of license: site(1), satellite(2), user(3)

ExtraFlags.description: Any additional data the license module needs.

ExtraInfo.description: Any additional data the license module needs.

SortOrder.description: Order in which licenses are sorted in the license calculations.

IsHidden.description:
Is the license hidden from the user? 
Hidden licenses are usually feature-specific, part of a larger bundle.

IsUnrestricted.description: Is the license limited to the number of licenses?

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.description:
Carrier object for Associate.
Services for the Associate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAssociateAgent">Associate Agent</see>.

Name.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

PersonId.description:
Owning person record 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Type.description: User type - 1 = internal user, 2 = resource, 3 = external user, 4 = anonymous, 5 = system

GroupIdx.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

FullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

FormalName.description: The associate's culture formatted formalname (firstname, middleName and lastname, title, mrmrs)

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
